mediasearch-title: Title text for the media search special page
mediasearch-continue:
Text for button to see next page of results
{{identical|Next}}
mediasearch-tab-image: Label text for tab with images search results
mediasearch-tab-audio:
Label text for tab with audio search results
{{identical|Audio}}
mediasearch-tab-video: Label text for tab with video search results
mediasearch-tab-page: Label text for tab with categories and pages search results
mediasearch-tab-other: Label text for tab with other file results
mediasearch-filter-size: Label text for dropdown to filter image search results by size
mediasearch-filter-size-any: Label text for option to filter media search results by any size
mediasearch-filter-size-small: Label text for option to filter media search results by small sizes
mediasearch-filter-size-medium: Label text for option to filter media search results by medium sizes
mediasearch-filter-size-large: Label text for option to filter media search results by large sizes
mediasearch-filter-file-type-any: Label text for option to filter media search results by any file type
mediasearch-filter-sort-label: Label that precedes sort option values
mediasearch-filter-license-any: Label text for option to filter media search results by any license
mediasearch-filter-license-cc-by: Label text for option to filter media search results by CC-BY licenses
mediasearch-filter-license-attribution: Label text for option to filter media search results by licenses requiring attribution
mediasearch-filter-license-cc-by-sa: Label text for option to filter media search results by CC-SA licenses
mediasearch-filter-license-attribution-s: Label text for option to filter media search results by licenses requiring attribution and same licensing
mediasearch-filter-license-unrestricted: Label text for option to filter media search results by CC-0 license or public domain media
mediasearch-filter-license-other: Label text for option to filter media search results by other licenses
mediasearch-filter-namespace-all:
Label text for option to filter by all namespaces
{{identical|All}}
mediasearch-filter-namespace-discussion:
Label text for option to filter by discussion namespaces
{{identical|Discussion}}
mediasearch-filter-namespace-help: Label text for option to filter by general help namespaces
mediasearch-filter-namespace-custom: Label text for option to filter by a custom list of namespaces
mediasearch-filter-namespace-label:
Label for the button that triggers the namespace filter dialog. Parameters:
* $1 - Current selected filter value message
mediasearch-filter-namespace-dialog-titl: Title for the namespace filter dialog
mediasearch-filter-namespace-dialog-prog: Label for the submit action in the namespace filter dialog
mediasearch-no-results: Message informing the user that no results were found
mediasearch-no-results-tips: Tips on how the user could improve their search query
mediasearch-end-of-results: Message informing the user that no additional results were found
mediasearch-empty-state:
Text prompting the user to search for media files. Parameters:
* $1 - Total number of media files
mediasearch-clear-title: Accessible title for search input clear button
mediasearch-input-label: Visually-hidden label for the Media Search search input
mediasearch-input-placeholder: Placeholder text for Media Search search input
mediasearch-load-more-results: Text for the 'load more results' button
mediasearch-quickview-button-text: Text for the button to go to the file page in the QuickView panel
mediasearch-quickview-close-button-text: Text for the button to close the QuickView panel
mediasearch-quickview-previous-button-te: Text for the button in the QuickView panel to open the preceding result in QuickView
mediasearch-quickview-next-button-text: Text for the button in the QuickView panel to open the next result in QuickView
mediasearch-category-info:
Meta information for category results. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of category members
* $2 - Number of subcategories
* $3 - Number of files
mediasearch-copytextlayout-copy:
Text for button to copy text to the clipboard
{{identical|Copy}}
mediasearch-copytextlayout-copy-fail: Message shown when copying to the clipboard fails
mediasearch-copytextlayout-copy-success: Message shown when copying to the clipboard succeeds
mediasearch-clear-filters: Label text for the control to clear existing search filters
mediasearch-results-count:
Total number of results for a search. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of results (totalhits)
mediasearch-wordcount:
Wordcount of a page, wrapped in parentheses. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of words (wordcount)
mediasearch-did-you-mean:
Text prompting the user to search for an alternate search term if they entered a likely typo. Parameters:
* $1 - Suggested term
* $2 - Link to search results for suggested term
mediasearch-error-message: Error message informing the user of an invalid search
mediasearch-error-text: Text prompting the user to retry their search query
mediasearch-specialsearch-default: Title of preference to use Special:Search as the default search (instead of Special:MediaSearch)
mediasearch-specialsearch-default-help: Help text for preference to use Special:Search as the default search (instead of Special:MediaSearch)
mediasearch-user-notice-title: Title text for notification notifying users they can change their default search option
mediasearch-user-notice-body: Body text for notification notifying users they can change their default search option
mediasearch-user-notice-dismiss: Label for button that closes notification
mediasearch-switch-special-search: A link so that the user can go to Special:Search
